XData.name: ProductionDefinition
XData.Data: <Production Name="Scan.ScanEmailProduction" TestingEnabled="true"> <ActorPoolSize>2</ActorPoolSize> <Item Name="Scan.MakeFileOperation" ClassName="Scan.MakeFileOperation" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" DisableErrorTraps="false" InactivityTimeout="0"> <Setting Target="Host" Name="RetryInterval">5</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="FailureTimeout">15</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="FilePath">c:\Integration\scan</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="Overwrite">0</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="Charset">Default</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="OpenTimeout">5</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="Scan.GetEmployeeDetails" ClassName="Scan.GetEmployeeDetails" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" DisableErrorTraps="false" InactivityTimeout="0"> <Setting Target="Host" Name="RetryInterval">5</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="FailureTimeout">15</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="DSN">Access</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="StayConnected">-1</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="ConnectTimeout">5</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="Scan.AddToAddressFile" ClassName="Scan.AddToAddressFile" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" DisableErrorTraps="false" InactivityTimeout="0"> </Item> <Item Name="Scan.GetEmployeeInfo" ClassName="Scan.GetEmployeeInfo" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" DisableErrorTraps="false" InactivityTimeout="0"> </Item> </Production>
